TopicTitle: Workaround for not being able to delete node - PS4

Articles.Content:
Rather than trying to right click on the node and clicking the red X to delete it, just click on the X (or checkmark) beside of the M/S remaining next to the nav bar.  The node will disappear.  Seems pretty reliable so far.

I still can't find a workaround for when you open a menu on a part during flight, and you click the button to make it stay on the screen, and then it won't turn off.  For example, you go to transfer fuel between two tanks.  You make the first stay on the screen by clicking the button in the corner, then right click on the other tank.  I find this often happens on larger crafts or when docking.  Only fix is exit to space center, and sometimes to completely restart the game.
